items.name: Monitor
items.description: A standard 24 inch, 1920 by 1080 resolution monitor. It has a 60hz refresh rate and the panel is IPS.
items.creator: admin

items.name: Desktop
items.description: A computer with a 4 core CPU and integrated graphics. Also contains 1 TB of storage and 8 GB of ram memory.
items.creator: admin

items.name: Keyboard
items.description: A mechanical swith keyboard. The switches feature a clicky acoustic and tactile feedback.
items.creator: admin

items.name: Mouse
items.description: A wireless mouse that uses a small dongle for connection. The mouse is also 'ergonomic' and fits nicely to the hand.
items.creator: admin

items.name: Laptop
items.description: A laptop with a 2 core CPU and integrated graphics. Contains 500 GB of storage and 4 GB of ram. Extremely portable form and weighs 2 kg.
items.creator: admin

items.name: Earphones
items.description: An earphone with 3 drivers on each channel. Made with precise German engineering.
items.creator: admin

items.name: External Harddrive
items.description: A omni-directional microphone that allows recordings from any direction.
items.creator: admin

items.name: Battery Backup
items.description: A massive 50,000 mAh battery to charge almost anything you can throw at it.
items.creator: admin

items.name: Micro SD card
items.description: A small data storage device that can be converted to fit any device IO.
items.creator: admin
